title: Zoom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Russian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small, cozy place where your place mat is a blank sheet, and you get a pencil to draw on it. Around 40% of the menu is vegetarian dishes colored in green; some of these are vegan suitable. You could ask to alter a dish to make it vegan. While waiting to be seated, fruit is offered to you.
